item.title: Getty to give free images for noncommercial use
item.description: Worlds largest stock images provider Getty Images will make its content free for noncommercial users after acknowledging its pictures were being aggressively used without proper licensing

item.title: Pussy Riot members burned and bruised in McDonalds attack
item.description: Two members of Pussy Riot were left with chemical burns and head injuries after they were attacked by youths in a branch of McDonalds the group said on Thursday
item.itunes:subtitle: Two members of Pussy Riot were left with chemical burns and head injuries after they were attacked by youths in a branch of McDonalds the group said on Thursday
item.itunes:summary: Two members of Pussy Riot were left with chemical burns and head injuries after they were attacked by youths in a branch of McDonalds the group said on Thursday

item.title: Ukraine crisis Crimea votes to join Russia
item.description: Crimeas parliament voted to join Russia on Thursday and its Moscowbacked government set a referendum within 10 days on the decision in a dramatic escalation of the crisis over the Ukrainian Black Sea peninsula
item.itunes:subtitle: Crimeas parliament voted to join Russia on Thursday and its Moscowbacked government set a referendum within 10 days on the decision in a dramatic escalation of the crisis over the Ukrainian Black Sea peninsula
item.itunes:summary: Crimeas parliament voted to join Russia on Thursday and its Moscowbacked government set a referendum within 10 days on the decision in a dramatic escalation of the crisis over the Ukrainian Black Sea peninsula

item.title: Putin discusses Crimea proposal to join Russia
item.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin on Thursday discussed with his Security Council a request by the proMoscow authorities in Crimea to join Russia Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov told news agencies
item.itunes:subtitle: Russian President Vladimir Putin on Thursday discussed with his Security Council a request by the proMoscow authorities in Crimea to join Russia Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov told news agencies
item.itunes:summary: Russian President Vladimir Putin on Thursday discussed with his Security Council a request by the proMoscow authorities in Crimea to join Russia Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov told news agencies

item.title: US announces visa restrictions on Russians
item.description: The United States on Thursday announced a set of punitive measures against individuals and entities endangering Ukraines sovereignty and integrity
item.itunes:subtitle: The United States on Thursday announced a set of punitive measures against individuals and entities endangering Ukraines sovereignty and integrity
item.itunes:summary: The United States on Thursday announced a set of punitive measures against individuals and entities endangering Ukraines sovereignty and integrity

item.title: Crimea votes to join Russia as EU leaders push Ukraine diplomacy
item.description: Crimeas parliament voted to join Russia on Thursday and its Moscowbacked government set a referendum within 10 days on the decision in a dramatic escalation of the crisis over the Ukrainian Black Sea peninsula

item.title: Karzais brother withdraws from Afghan election
item.description: The brother of Afghan president Hamid Karzai on Thursday dropped out of the countrys election and endorsed Zalmai Rassoul a move widely seen as signalling the current leaders preferred choice of successor
item.itunes:subtitle: The brother of Afghan president Hamid Karzai on Thursday dropped out of the countrys election and endorsed Zalmai Rassoul a move widely seen as signalling the current leaders preferred choice of successor
item.itunes:summary: The brother of Afghan president Hamid Karzai on Thursday dropped out of the countrys election and endorsed Zalmai Rassoul a move widely seen as signalling the current leaders preferred choice of successor

item.title: Bharara Indianorigin actress to speak at Harvard Law School
item.description: Indianborn US Attorney Preet Bharara and Indianorigin actress Mindy Kaling will speak at this years commencement ceremonies at the prestigious Harvard Law School
item.itunes:subtitle: Indianborn US Attorney Preet Bharara and Indianorigin actress Mindy Kaling will speak at this years commencement ceremonies at the prestigious Harvard Law School
item.itunes:summary: Indianborn US Attorney Preet Bharara and Indianorigin actress Mindy Kaling will speak at this years commencement ceremonies at the prestigious Harvard Law School

item.title: Countdown to end human safaris in Andamans
item.description: A Londonbased organisation that helped expose human safaris in the Andaman Islands in 2012 has launched a oneyear coundown timer to end ongoing tourist traffic to see the Jarawa tribe by March 2015
item.itunes:subtitle: A Londonbased organisation that helped expose human safaris in the Andaman Islands in 2012 has launched a oneyear coundown timer to end ongoing tourist traffic to see the Jarawa tribe by March 2015
item.itunes:summary: A Londonbased organisation that helped expose human safaris in the Andaman Islands in 2012 has launched a oneyear coundown timer to end ongoing tourist traffic to see the Jarawa tribe by March 2015

item.title: Europe violence against women goes underreported
item.description: The EU Agency for Fundamental Rights released the results of the worlds biggestever survey on violence against women carried out across all 28 states The report exposes the vast extent of abuse suffered by European women Abused silenced
item.itunes:subtitle: The EU Agency for Fundamental Rights released the results of the worlds biggestever survey on violence against women carried out across all 28 states The report exposes the vast extent of abuse suffered by European women Abused silenced   &
item.itunes:summary: The EU Agency for Fundamental Rights released the results of the worlds biggestever survey on violence against women carried out across all 28 states The report exposes the vast extent of abuse suffered by European women Abused silenced

item.title: Russia US seek solution to Ukraine crisis at talks
item.description: The US and Russia stepped up diplomatic efforts to defuse the Ukraine crisis on Wednesday amid heightened tensions on the ground in the flashpoint area of Crimea as gunmen threatened the UN envoy
item.itunes:subtitle: The US and Russia stepped up diplomatic efforts to defuse the Ukraine crisis on Wednesday amid heightened tensions on the ground in the flashpoint area of Crimea as gunmen threatened the UN envoy
item.itunes:summary: The US and Russia stepped up diplomatic efforts to defuse the Ukraine crisis on Wednesday amid heightened tensions on the ground in the flashpoint area of Crimea as gunmen threatened the UN envoy

item.title: China ups defence budget to staggering 132bn
item.description: China on Wednesday announced a defence budget for 2014 that at around 132 billion or 80823 billion Yuan is nearly 100 billion more that of Indias 36 billion
item.itunes:subtitle: China on Wednesday announced a defence budget for 2014 that at around 132 billion or 80823 billion Yuan is nearly 100 billion more that of Indias 36 billion
item.itunes:summary: China on Wednesday announced a defence budget for 2014 that at around 132 billion or 80823 billion Yuan is nearly 100 billion more that of Indias 36 billion

item.title: UN envoy forced out of Crimea by proRussian crowd
item.description: A UN special envoy was forced to abandon a mission to Ukraines Russianoccupied Crimea region on Wednesday after being stopped by armed men and besieged inside a cafe by a hostile crowd shouting Russia Russia
item.itunes:subtitle: A UN special envoy was forced to abandon a mission to Ukraines Russianoccupied Crimea region on Wednesday after being stopped by armed men and besieged inside a cafe by a hostile crowd shouting Russia Russia
item.itunes:summary: A UN special envoy was forced to abandon a mission to Ukraines Russianoccupied Crimea region on Wednesday after being stopped by armed men and besieged inside a cafe by a hostile crowd shouting Russia Russia

item.title: Witness Pistorius asked friend to take blame for restaurant gunshot
item.description: Blade Runner Oscar Pistorius told a friend to take the blame for him accidentally firing a pistol under the table in a packed Johannesburg restaurant in January 2013 a month before he killed his girlfriend his murder trial heard on Wednesday
item.itunes:subtitle: Blade Runner Oscar Pistorius told a friend to take the blame for him accidentally firing a pistol under the table in a packed Johannesburg restaurant in January 2013 a month before he killed his girlfriend his murder trial heard on Wednesday  &n
item.itunes:summary: Blade Runner Oscar Pistorius told a friend to take the blame for him accidentally firing a pistol under the table in a packed Johannesburg restaurant in January 2013 a month before he killed his girlfriend his murder trial heard on Wednesday

item.title: Im not a superman still opposed to gay marriage says Pope Francis
item.description: Pope Francis has played down the notion that he is a superman who will bring sweeping reforms to the Roman Catholic church stressing that its ban on contraception and opposition to gay marriage will remain in place
item.itunes:subtitle: Pope Francis has played down the notion that he is a superman who will bring sweeping reforms to the Roman Catholic church stressing that its ban on contraception and opposition to gay marriage will remain in place
item.itunes:summary: Pope Francis has played down the notion that he is a superman who will bring sweeping reforms to the Roman Catholic church stressing that its ban on contraception and opposition to gay marriage will remain in place

item.title: Indians among top migrant entrepreneurs in UK report
item.description: Young Indian entrepreneurs are among top five nationalities whose citizens have set up companies and created jobs in Britain partly challenging the antiimmigration rhetoric in public discourse in recent years
item.itunes:subtitle: Young Indian entrepreneurs are among top five nationalities whose citizens have set up companies and created jobs in Britain partly challenging the antiimmigration rhetoric in public discourse in recent years
item.itunes:summary: Young Indian entrepreneurs are among top five nationalities whose citizens have set up companies and created jobs in Britain partly challenging the antiimmigration rhetoric in public discourse in recent years

item.title: US first lady felicitates Indian acid attack victim Laxmi
item.description: US first lady Michelle Obama has felicitated Indian acid attack victim Laxmi after she won the International Women of Courage Award for successfully leading the campaign against acid attacks on women in India
item.itunes:subtitle: US first lady Michelle Obama has felicitated Indian acid attack victim Laxmi after she won the International Women of Courage Award for successfully leading the campaign against acid attacks on women in India
item.itunes:summary: US first lady Michelle Obama has felicitated Indian acid attack victim Laxmi after she won the International Women of Courage Award for successfully leading the campaign against acid attacks on women in India

item.title: Witness testimony to challenge Pistorius defence
item.description: Oscar Pistoriuss murder trial was set Wednesday to hear further testimony of screams and gunshots the night Reeva Steenkamp died challenging the sprinters defence against premeditated murder
item.itunes:subtitle: Oscar Pistoriuss murder trial was set Wednesday to hear further testimony of screams and gunshots the night Reeva Steenkamp died challenging the sprinters defence against premeditated murder
item.itunes:summary: Oscar Pistoriuss murder trial was set Wednesday to hear further testimony of screams and gunshots the night Reeva Steenkamp died challenging the sprinters defence against premeditated murder

item.title: After losing themselves to opium addiction trying to rebuild their lost lives
item.description: It is a spartan life of dormitory beds communal eating and prayer but the Jangalak treatment centre in Kabul offers a rare glimmer of hope for heroin addicts caught in Afghanistans spiralling drug problem
item.itunes:subtitle: It is a spartan life of dormitory beds communal eating and prayer but the Jangalak treatment centre in Kabul offers a rare glimmer of hope for heroin addicts caught in Afghanistans spiralling drug problem
item.itunes:summary: It is a spartan life of dormitory beds communal eating and prayer but the Jangalak treatment centre in Kabul offers a rare glimmer of hope for heroin addicts caught in Afghanistans spiralling drug problem

item.title: Russia testfires ICBM amid tension over Ukraine
item.description: Russia said it had successfully testfired an Intercontinental Ballistic Missile ICBM on Tuesday with tensions high over its seizure of control in the Crimea and its threat to send more forces to its neighbour Ukraine
item.itunes:subtitle: Russia said it had successfully testfired an Intercontinental Ballistic Missile ICBM on Tuesday with tensions high over its seizure of control in the Crimea and its threat to send more forces to its neighbour Ukraine
item.itunes:summary: Russia said it had successfully testfired an Intercontinental Ballistic Missile ICBM on Tuesday with tensions high over its seizure of control in the Crimea and its threat to send more forces to its neighbour Ukraine

item.title: A little bit of Picasso in the art of others
item.description: An exhibition that traces the impact of the artist Pablo Picasso on contemporary international art opens on Wednesday in Barcelona The works of Indian artists Atul Dodiya and MF Husain will also be displayed
item.itunes:subtitle: An exhibition that traces the impact of the artist Pablo Picasso on contemporary international art opens on Wednesday in Barcelona The works of Indian artists Atul Dodiya and MF Husain will also be displayed
item.itunes:summary: An exhibition that traces the impact of the artist Pablo Picasso on contemporary international art opens on Wednesday in Barcelona The works of Indian artists Atul Dodiya and MF Husain will also be displayed

item.title: 30000yearold giant virus comes back to life in French lab
item.description: French scientists said on Monday they had revived a giant but harmless virus that had been locked in the Siberian permafrost for more than 30000 years
item.itunes:subtitle: French scientists said on Monday they had revived a giant but harmless virus that had been locked in the Siberian permafrost for more than 30000 years
item.itunes:summary: French scientists said on Monday they had revived a giant but harmless virus that had been locked in the Siberian permafrost for more than 30000 years

item.title: Gunmen storm government complex in Iraqs Samarra
item.description: Gunmen in military uniform broke into the city council and court house in Samarra in northern Iraq on Tuesday holding the facility for four hours until police and army stormed the compound the mayor and police officials said
item.itunes:subtitle: Gunmen in military uniform broke into the city council and court house in Samarra in northern Iraq on Tuesday holding the facility for four hours until police and army stormed the compound the mayor and police officials said
item.itunes:summary: Gunmen in military uniform broke into the city council and court house in Samarra in northern Iraq on Tuesday holding the facility for four hours until police and army stormed the compound the mayor and police officials said

item.title: Build a wall of bronze and iron for ethnic unity Xi Jinping
item.description: President Xi Jinping on Tuesday called for strengthening ethnic unity and social stability in the country days after the government said separatists from Xinjiang were behind the deadly knife attacks in Kunming that left 33 including four suspects dead and injured more than 140
item.itunes:subtitle: President Xi Jinping on Tuesday called for strengthening ethnic unity and social stability in the country days after the government said separatists from Xinjiang were behind the deadly knife attacks in Kunming that left 33 including four suspects dead an
item.itunes:summary: President Xi Jinping on Tuesday called for strengthening ethnic unity and social stability in the country days after the government said separatists from Xinjiang were behind the deadly knife attacks in Kunming that left 33 including four suspects dead and injured more than 140

item.title: US man declared dead begins breathing in embalming room
item.description: A 78yearold man from Holmes County Mississippi was declared dead and a Coroner was called over at his home However he woke up in a body bag just before being embalmed
